name: Matchtris (3 Match Block Puzzle)
description:
Supported languages: English, Korean, Japanese
*In case of Screenshot, Game Play Video, Game played Korean version.

*Banner or Rewared Ads are included in the game.

Rotate and Match Blocks

You can score points by dropping the blocks in the same color location.

Make Combos to get more score
The more combos, the more points you get.

Clear the mission and raise the level to get more points.

Overcome obstacles and more block speed,  try your best.

Compete with users from all over the world.
Show off your new record to your friends through Twitter.

* Matchtris is inspired by a 3-match puzzle games and Tetris game.
